scripts.test:parallel:chrome: npm run test:movie -- --browser chrome --group Movie & npm run test:swagger -- --browser chrome --group Swagger
scripts.test:parallel:electron: npm run test:movie -- --browser electron --group Movie & npm run test:swagger -- --browser electron --group Swagger
scripts.test:parallel:firefox: npm run test:movie -- --browser firefox --group Movie --ci-build-id 7 & npm run test:swagger -- --browser firefox --group Swagger --ci-build-id 7
scripts.test:parallel:streams: npm run test:movie -- --browser chrome --group Movie --ci-build-id 8 & npm run test:swagger -- --browser firefox --group Swagger --ci-build-id 8
